summary: An ordinance relating to the finances of the Department of Health and Sanitation, making certain intra department fund and budget item transfers, and authorizing the Commissioner of Health to incur an expenditure not exceeding Three Hundred ($300.00) Dollars, for the purpose of ascertaining certain specified particular and specific facts and procuring certain specified specific data upon which his official action upon certain specified pending questions is to depend, and to send Miss May Loomis to Detroit, Michigan in order to effectuate such purpose.
